Scrub fire burning swampland in North Waikato near Meremere https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/scrub-fire-burning-swampland-in-north-waikato-near-meremere/2RZ6PFUTNZBFPG2NQHPKLU3TUQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/scrub-fire-burning-swampland-in-north-waikato-near-meremere/2RZ6PFUTNZBFPG2NQHPKLU3TUQ/ Malisha Kumar, Maryana GarciaFirefighters were alerted to the blaze off Island Block Rd about 1.15pm on Monday. Mon, 21 Oct 2024 22:10:02 +0000 A fire that has burned through 80ha of scrub and swampland in North Waikato is contained but not controlled, fire authorities say. Photo / Fenz
Youths climb on roof of Wiri justice facility, demand Big Macs, cigarettes https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/13-youths-climb-on-roof-of-justice-facility-demand-big-macs-香烟/T4FQ4SBSNJGNBAAWPOBDKTIYWU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/13-youths-climb-on-roof-of-justice-facility-demand-big-macs-香烟/T4FQ4SBSNJGNBAAWPOBDKTIYWU/ David Williams, Rachel MaherThe facility is the same site where a group were guided down with fast food last year. Mon, 21 Oct 2024 22:07:55 +0000 Police, along with youth justice facility staff, remain in negotiations with several youths after they gained access to the roof of its Wiri facility last night. Photo / Carson Bluck
New Kerikeri orchard at historic site springs from country’s oldest fruit trees https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/new-kerikeri-orchard-at-historic-site-come-from-countrys-oldest-fruit-trees/BDDZ3FXJ2VEIRCQT46CWWXLFJM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/new-kerikeri-orchard-at-historic-site-come-from-countrys-oldest-fruit-trees/BDDZ3FXJ2VEIRCQT46CWWXLFJM/ Mike DinsdaleOrchard at Kerikeri's Edmonds Ruins propagated from near 200-year-old trees. Safer Boating Week ‘as important as ever’: 14 deaths in NZ this yearhttps://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/safer-boating-week-as-important-as-ever-14-deaths-in-nz-this-year/FPLAICKB75HHNKX42TNL2BZGB4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/safer-boating-week-as-important-as-ever-14-deaths-in-nz-this-year/FPLAICKB75HHNKX42TNL2BZGB4/ Wynsley WrigleySafer Boating Week 2024 highlights safety on the water; lifejackets are essential. Mon, 21 Oct 2024 21:45:15 +0000 Gisborne harbourmaster Peter Buell wants everyone to have the right equipment and the right knowledge to remain safe on the water. Lifejackets are essential, he says. Safer Boating Week started on Monday.

Photo / Supplied
Treaty & Me lectures aim to promote healthy discussion around Te Tiriti o Waitangi https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/treaty-me-lectures-aim-to-promote-healthy-discussion-around-te-tiriti-o-waitangi/S6Z7764G6BDVTPFNMLBVXBNHMU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/treaty-me-lectures-aim-to-promote-healthy-discussion-around-te-tiriti-o-waitangi/S6Z7764G6BDVTPFNMLBVXBNHMU/ Free public lecture series to engage with Te Tiriti o Waitangi. Mon, 21 Oct 2024 21:35:07 +0000 Avril Bell will be giving the first of four in a series of public lectures, titled The Treaty & Me, aimed at making a positive contribution to information, education and support to implement Te Tiriti o Waitangi.
